column4: Hi there! I'm here to help you change your dinner habits and maybe find some new recipes for you to cook.So before I recommend something let me ask you a few more questions. First things first: how hungry are you?
How healthy do you want your meal to be?
Any specific diet or intolerances I should be aware of?
We're almost there. How much time to you want to spend cooking tonight?
One last question. Is there any food you'd like to use? Something already in your kitchen or that you could buy?
